Job Posting:170882 - Position: F25 Software Test Engineer 170882 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/27/2025 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 06/20/2025 10:48 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Stryker 8329 Eastlake Drive, Unit 101, Burnaby V5A 4W2 British Columbia Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Who we are? 2025 - Fall F25 Software Test Engineer 170882 Co-op Position Burnaby, BC Canada 8 months CAD 50000.0 per year for 0 Major List 50,000-55,000 Stryker is one of the world's leading medical technology companies and is dedicated to helping healthcare professionals perform their jobs more efficiently while enhancing patient care. The Company offers a diverse array of innovative medical technologies, including reconstructive, medical and surgical, and neurotechnology and spine products to help people lead more active and more satisfying lives. We are currently seeking a Software Test Engineer, Co-Op to join Stryker Endoscopy's Test team located in Burnaby, Canada. What we do? We partner closely with R&D to experiment with early prototypes and vet product designs throughout the design process. You will be responsible for design verification: from developing and maintaining test protocols, and test execution to documenting results in test reports that are included in regulatory submissions. Communication and coordination are essential skills as you will share and/or coordinate samples, test execution, and test results with the team lead. What you will do? • Demonstrated knowledge of understanding the Software test discipline. • Applies engineering judgement in a subset of their area to root cause defects and develop test methods. • Develops repeatable test methods of simple complexity for a well-defined requirement. • Has a high-level understanding of the functionality of the product(s). • Gathers feedback from users and technical leaders during test protocol development. • Demonstrates high level of understanding on the Design Controls, regulatory standards and guidance applicable to specific test protocols. • Responsible for performing test execution and developing test results following Good Documentation Practices (GDP) Regularly updates Test Lead and/or Functional Manager with status of tasks. • Work from Home: Occasional Travel Percentage: 20% Stryker Corporation is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or protected veteran status. Stryker is an EO employer - M/F/Veteran/Disability. Stryker Corporation will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractor's legal duty to furnish information. Job Requirements What we need: • Working towards Bachelor's degree (B.S.) in Computer Science (or other related) and/or Electrical Engineering with 0-4 years of previous technical experience • Excellent analytical skills Exhibit initiative, dependability, independence, motivation, and be detail-oriented • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Yes Address Cover Letter to Hiring Manager
